# Contributing to Mathsys
Thank you for considering contributing! Hereâ€™s how you can help:

## Reporting Issues
- Check existing issues first
- Provide clear steps to reproduce
- You may also want to add feature requests

## Submitting Pull Requests
- Fork the repository and branch from `dead-end`
- Write clear commit messages
- Check compilation pipeline works as intended
- Submit a pull request

## Code Style
- Follow existing code style
